description:
沪江英乐：欢呼吧，丹麦超人气帅哥男星 Christopher 新单《Told You So》！帅哥你怎么还不火！一张嘴我们就会沉醉在他的声音里的，还是一如既往的好听啊，节奏感很强。换了发型依然帅气，他的歌首首经典啊。

【Christopher 动感新单《Told You So》】

歌词：

Hey there sexy lady
I’m loving what you do
I’m a little intoxicated
I’m thinking so you
You’re trying to deny
But I know I’ve changed your mind
And please don’t try to fight it
Cause I know that you’ll be mine
be mine

Chorus:
I want you baby
Come get it boy
I need you baby
Come get it boy
I’m on you boy
Come show it boy
I’ve showed you baby
Let’s go out of here
I do it right
After tonight

I love to say
I told you so
And I love to see
You let it go
X 2

All the lady say
Hey hey hey
X 2

They say that I’m a player
And it seem that’s kinda true
Don’t wanna be a player no more
But I just think they’re hating
Cause they have nothing on you
They have nothing on you girl
And a girl with your pretentious
It’s something’s that’s real
Real…
So I can talk around it
Around and around
Just tell you how I feel
For real

Chorus:
I want you baby
Come get it boy
I need you baby
Come get it boy
I’m on you boy
Come show it boy
I’ve showed you baby
Let’s go out of here
I do it right
After tonight

I love to say
I told you so
And I love to see
You let it go
X 2

All the lady say
Hey hey hey
X 2
Hey heyah

Hey there sexy lady
I’m loving what you do
I’m a little intoxicated
I’m thinking so you


I love to say
I told you so
And I love to see
You let it go
X 2

All the lady say
Hey hey hey
X 2
Hey heyah
